objects.text:
• 100% Pure, No Preservatives Added
• Rich in Essential Nutrients & Calcium
• Sourced from Local Dairy Farms

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Premium Dairy Milk - Pure & Natural Goodness
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Farm-Fresh Whole Milk
• No artificial hormones or preservatives added
• Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
• Creamy texture perfect for drinking and cooking
• Available in various sizes - bottle and pitcher options
• Pasteurized for safety while maintaining natural taste
• Sourced from local dairy farms
• Perfect for families and daily nutrition needs
• Ideal for baking, cooking, and direct consumption
• Recyclable glass packaging for eco-conscious consumers

banner_details:
The banner showcases a clean and modern design with a soft light-to-white gradient background and subtle abstract elements like circles and wave lines for an organic flow. A prominent product image of glass bottles and a glass of milk is placed on the right side, giving the banner a healthy and fresh appeal. The headline text layer ("heading") is bold and uppercase, emphasizing product quality. Below it, the tagline ("tagline") adds a soft, italic touch in blue. An informative description layer ("description") lists three product benefits in bullet points. The price ("price") is bold and tech-style, and a rounded call-to-action button ("cta_button") with a “SHOP NOW” label ("cta") is placed below. The layout is balanced and visually persuasive.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#1A365D)
- Sky Blue (#4A90E2)
- Light Blue Gradient (#E6F3FF to #FFFFFF)
- Charcoal Gray (#2D3748)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features fresh milk in glass containers, creating a clean and refreshing visual aesthetic. The primary color is a soft, creamy white (#F8F9F5) representing the milk, which conveys purity and health. Transparent glass with cool light blue highlights (#B3D3F2) adds a touch of sophistication and freshness. Subtle gradients from white to light gray (#E0E0E0) enhance depth and realism, while icy blue tones around the glass edges (#A6C9DE) give a crisp and cooling effect. These colors blend seamlessly, highlighting the purity of the product. This palette is ideal for a banner that evokes cleanliness, freshness, and health.
